file_content.text: The Houk's going to break quickly. We can rest easy knowing those pirates will soon be hunting Republic targets.
You're back. Guess the Scourge wasn't brutal enough this time.
They're going to make a nice weapon against the Republic. Right, pirate?
Get spaced, Sithspawn. Free me, and I won't have my kinsmen bring this base down on your head.
All right. If you're not in the mood to chat with me, I've got an interrogator waiting.
I hope he's worth the effort it took to get him here.
He's all yours.
He'll agree to help us, or his successor will. Don't worry.
I think that's everything.
And with the style I was led to expect. Thank you.
I want credits for this.
We'll have our stolen supplies back in no time. You can have a cut.
I'll ship this one out to a holding facility. Good day.
Get me a prisoner I can talk to! I won't suffer another attack by these pirate scum.
My lord! I wasn't alerted that we were having honored guests.
Sir. I didn't know there was an Intelligence operative here. Then again, I guess that's the point.
I'd heard you were on this ice ball. I followed your work on Alderaan. I'm something of a fan.
The audacity of these pirates! I--oh. I'm sorry. I didn't see you there.
I'm afraid I can't offer you a decent meal. The Scourge just captured another supply transport. Blasted pirates butchered everyone on board.
I've never heard of the Scourge.
The Scourge?
They're savages. Worse even than the rest of that White Maw scum.
This is unacceptable, Captain. Do I need to deal with these pirates, since you cannot?
I have no fear of pirates.
I apologize, my lord. But your assistance would be welcome.
I don't normally take out other people's trash, but if you're paying....
I can deal with pirates.
Your help is appreciated, though I should warn you first.
You need someone to teach these pirates a lesson. I could be available.
I can deal with pirates.
Regular pirates we could handle, these scum are different.
They're just pirates. No match for Imperial troops.
Surely you can deal with them.
I've sent troops to guard our transports, but it's not enough to deter them.
They're Houks--alien filth that only respect strength and other Houks.
I need manpower to capture their chief--harness the head, the rest of the beast will follow.
You want to convince the Houks to serve the Empire?
What's the plan?
The enemies of the Empire deserve only death.
You mean kill, not capture.
Normally, I would agree with you, but why destroy a tool that can still be useful?
You've got to be joking.
It won't be easy, you're right, but think of what the Empire stands to gain.
You've got the firepower to do this alone. Capture the Houk leader, and I'll "persuade" him and his band to attack the Republic.
Pushing into Scourge territory should be straightforward. The difficult part will be wrestling a half-tonne of alien muscle back across the tundra while his friends shoot at you.
Difficult for you perhaps. Not for me.
I'll have no problems.
They will learn to fear the power of the dark side.
I won't have any problems.
Big, small, it doesn't matter. I've never let a quarry get away.
Sounds like my line of work.
They won't even notice me until it's far too late.
It will be easy for me.
I was hoping you'd say something like that.
It's beneath me, but why not.
They may only be pirates, but you're on their turf. A cornered rat fights the hardest.
You'll need these stun-cuffs to restrain the Houk once you've captured him.
Bring your prisoner to me when you're done. I'll see he's taken care of.
Not for you. [Refuse quest]
I--as you wish, my lord. Sorry to have bothered you.
That's the problem with scum like you. No sense of loyalty.
I'm certain whatever you're working on is equally important. Good day.
Your cowardice disgusts me. Perhaps you'd be more comfortable with the pirates.
Pirate scum. They're practically an infestation on this ball of ice. Someone should do something.
